name: Gravity Frivolity
description:
Gravity: the force that attracts a body toward the center of the earth, or toward any other physical body having mass. For most purposes Newton's laws of gravity apply, with minor modifications to take the general theory of relativity into account.

Frivolity: lack of seriousness; lightheartedness

Use gravity to your advantage! Shift the room to get the ball to crash into the orbs to open the door, all the way to freedom! Well, kinda. Each of these twenty levels are different and only end after you finish em all, because logic.

This game includes:

An original soundtrack by Outofthelyric

Twenty unique levels

Entertainment

You can also play with an xBox 360 controller!!!

Whats new in recent update V1.1.2:

*fixed the sound bug at the beginning
